body.ab: || tshad ma shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba ||
gyi gzhan sel dang | gzhan bsal nas brjod pa sgra'i gzhan sel zhes bya ba yang gnas so zhes bdag gi bla ma blo gros kyi spyan dang ldan pa dag gsung ngo ||

kha cig
na re snang pa'i don la nges shes 'dren mi nus pa yin no zhes zer ro rtag pa We take "rtag pa" to be an alternative way of referring to "sTag/rTag" ||
kha cig phya rgya sgro 'dogs dang mi 'gal ba'i snang pa yin no zhes zer ba
The author of this view is identified as Phya pa (id:3831) by Glo bo mkhan chen. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 32, n. 49. 'di ni mi 'thad de |

kha cig na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin las tha dad du 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nam mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin no zhes zer ro || This view is also mentioned in RTRG VIII 186,14 (mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan yin na…). RTGKh 163,8, RTŚ19 Dza 70b1 (=586) and RTŚ10 Tha 128a5 (=255) identify it as rNgog Lo tsa ba chen po (ID: 3786)'s view.

gangs pa na re gal te tshad ma ni ¦ yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min || phyir na tshad ma nyid ma yin ¦ PV I.200ab sadasanniścayaphalāneti syād vā 'pramāṇatā. Also cited in bsDus pa 26b6. ma yin: PV bsDus pa mi 'gyur zhes 'byung pa'i tshul gyis yod pa dang med par nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin na 'dis ni de lta
bu'i nges pa mi skyed pas tshad ma ma yin no zhe na |

kha cig rgya grags sod na re de ni bum snang gi shes pa chos can rkyen gsuM las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan bzhi pa cig la ltos pa yin te rkyen gsuM tshang yang res 'ga' bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'bras bu ldog pa'i rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag gis sgrub po zhes zer ro ||

kha cig rtsangCf. bsDus pa (ID:4550) 61b8-62a2 'di snyam du skad cig snga phyi'i rdzas de lta na yang de dag la ye shes kyis 'gro ba rtogs pa 'am sngon po nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ba yod dam myed | myed na spyi ma rtogs pa'i bye brag rtogs par 'gal la | yod na yang de nyid la ye shes phyi ma bcad pa'i shes pa ji ltar ma yin | gzhan yang rtog pa myed mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur la | sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin | des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma nyid la ldog pa la bcad pa'i yul can nyid kho na ste |
na re rdzas la ltos nas bcad shes ma yin kyang rigs la ltos nas sngar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i phyir bcad pa'i yul can ji ltar ma yin | gzhan yang rtog pa med mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la | sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin | des na thams cad mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma dang rigs la bcad pa'i yul can yin no zhes zer ro ||
kha cig byang Tentative identification of Byang as Byang chub skyabs na re rdzas la ltos nas kyang bcad pa'i yul can du 'gyur te | rdzas sngar ma rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro ||

'di la kha cig phya 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ye shes da ltar ba la mi snang yang da ltar ba'i dngos po snang pa'i shugs la de'i rgyu' dpal dang 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin no zhes zer ro ||

@@||
yid kyi mun pa ma lus sel byed pa ||
rigs tshul dri med shes rab sgron ma 'di ||
dpal ldan grags pa'i gzhung dang bla ma'i ||
gsung la brten nas gzhan phan yid kyis sbyar ||
'di las byung pa'i dge tshogs mthu' ldan des ||
skye bo thams cad rigs lam 'dir zhugs te ||
lta ngan g.yang sa'i ri bo rab bsnyil nas ||
yang dag lta ba'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par shog || ||
